taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a matrix displayed in your editor.

step.cmd: Drag and drop a dataset attribute to the cells section. The underlying business type of the attribute must be a Number or an Amount.
From the Properties view, click the General tab and define the aggregation type as 'Weighted Mean'.
From the Properties view , click on the General tab and define the Aggregation Type as 'Weighted Mean'.
Select the dataset attribute to the Weighted Mean's Weight. The underlying business type of this attribute must be Amount.
